name: tinyprofiler-client
description: shared client for tinyprofiler, a minimal JavaScript profiler
author: Andrew Couch <tinyprofiler@andrewcou.ch>

scripts.build: coffee -c -o lib src && node-sass src/index.sass lib/index.css
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.package: cp -r lib README.markdown LICENSE package.json dist
